sentences.sentence: Objective to study the microsurgical anatomy of the posterior inferior cerebellar artery (PICA).
sentences.translation: 目的研究小脑后下动脉(PICA)的显微解剖结构。

sentences.sentence: PICA, which provided services in Europe, was acquired by OCLC, with full ownership completed July 3, 2007.
sentences.translation: OCLC还收购了在欧洲提供服务的PICA，在2007年8月3日完全获得其所有权。

sentences.sentence: Objective To investigate the microsurgical treatment of aneurysms of the posterior inferior cerebellar artery(PICA).
sentences.translation: 目的探讨小脑后下动脉瘤（PICA）的显微外科治疗方法。
